item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades this home furnishings stock, calls for nearly 30% upside ahead
item.description: Shares of this luxury lifestyle brand may be poised for big gains ahead, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts like the growth opportunities for these three stocks
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service underscores three stocks favored by the Street's top pros, including Uber Technologies and Nvidia.

item.title: Goldman's top stocks to play a still-healthy consumer in 2025
item.description: The state of the consumer may be strong in 2025, according to Goldman Sachs, and there are several stocks that could be primed for upside as a result.

item.title: Earnings playbook: Big banks kick off the reporting season, along with a major health insurer
item.description: UnitedHealth is among the roughly 20 S&P 500 names on deck to release their latest financial results.
